segments.text: I see a kitchen scene, quite ordinary at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A woman is standing at the sink, diligently drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus seems entirely on that one task, her hands moving rhythmically.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I notice the sink is actively overflowing, water gushing over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring down the cabinet doors, forming a growing puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is actually submerged in this water, yet she shows no sign of noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression remains completely neutral, almost serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's incredible how absorbed she is in her task, completely oblivious to the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't felt the water or heard it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is steadily expanding, threatening to spread further across the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is definitely going to lead to some water damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a strange situation unfolding right before my eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR
